bibl.title: Marie Le Fevre, Yvonne Le Fevre, & Georgette Normand v. M. Angelique. Certiorari
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

person.persName: Marie Le Fevre, Yvonne Le Fevre, & Georgette Normand

div1.p: In the United States Circuit Court for the Districtof Wshington, Northern Division.

In the matter of the petition of James P. Lavin n Immigrant Inspector and sister M.Angelique, Sister Superior of the House or Good Shepard, for a writ of Habeas Corpus.} No. RETUN TO WRIT OF Certiorari
State of Washington ss County of King

I, C.A.KOEPFLI, County Clerk ofKing County and ex-of ficio Clerk of the Superior Court of the Stateof Washington,for the County of King, do hereby certify that the foregoing is a full, true and correct transcript of the entire record and proceedings in cause No. 38028, In the matter of the application of Yvonne LeFevre, Marie LeFevre and Grorgette Normandfor a writ of habeas corpus, as a retun to the Writ of Certiorari, issued out of the United States Circuit Court for the District of Washington, Northern Division, and Directed to the Superior Courtof the State of Washington,for King County.
IN TESTIMONY WHEREOF I have herento set my hand and afficed the seal of said Court this 14th day of Febuary, A.D. 1903.
By J M Brecuster Deputy Clerk
In the mater of the application of Lavin et al for Writ of Certiori
Returned of Sperior Court of King En
FILED IN THE U.S. Circuit Court, DIST. OF WASHINGTON. FEB 14 1903 A. REEVES AVRES, Clerk HMS Statishem Dep.
